Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_1rqdlyxw&referenceId=1_1rqdlyxw&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: South Korean stocks ended the day - and the week - with the flourish...tracking strength in U.S. equity futures after online retailer Amazon beat profit estimates.Investors appeared to shrug off data that signalled South Korea's consumer inflation in January hovered near a decade high.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3onO6BU
